department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Underground utilities work for Canadian Forces Base Suffield
description: See attached documents for full details
full_summary:
### W6897-230050 - Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

**Solicitation Details**

* **Tender Title (English)**: W6897-230050 - Underground Utilities Standing Offer
* **Tender Title (French)**: W6897-230050 - Offre à commandes pour des installations souterraines de services publics
* **Reference Number**: WS3662757313-Doc3662757362
* **Publication Date**: 2022-12-06
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-12-29 14:00:00

**Contract Information**

* **Contract Type**: Standing Offer
* **Term**: 3 years
* **Estimated Contract End Date**: 2025-10-31
* **Goods/Services to be Provided**: Underground utilities work for the Department of National Defence (DND) at Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Suffield and other utility infrastructure locations.

**Procurement Details**

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Medicine Hat, Alberta
* **Regions of Delivery**: Medicine Hat, Alberta

**Notice Information**

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Information**:
	+ Victoria Lee (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Phone: [Not provided]
	+ Email: [victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:victoria.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Important Notice**

Please note that the tender closing date has been modified. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by December 29, 2022, by 14:00:00. Late bids will be deemed non-responsive.

### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) Details

The industry is invited to submit a response to this RFSO for the provision of underground utility services to DND at CFB Suffield and other utility infrastructure locations. The RFSO will be issued for a term of three years, and it is anticipated that only one firm will be issued a standing offer.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work includes the provision of underground utilities work, comprising materials, labour, equipment, supervision, and transportation necessary to supply and deliver underground water and sewer pipes to CFB Suffield and other utility infrastructure locations.
